sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {selectCartTotal, selectCartItem} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selector'; import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import './checkoutPage.styles.scss'; const CheckoutPage = ({CartItems,Total}) =>(
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ CartItems.map(cartItem=> cartItem.name) }
Total: ${Total}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ CartItems:selectCartItem, Total:selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage);
